mapper.insert: insert into t_campus_event (event_id, event_info, event_img1, event_img2, event_img3, release_time) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventImg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventImg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventImg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{releaseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select event_id, event_info, event_img1, event_img2, event_img3, release_time from t_campus_event
select event_id, event_info, event_img1, event_img2, event_img3, release_time from t_campus_event where release_time=#{releaseTime}
